Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class Interactions

Defines all types of interactions that exist among BattleEntities and provides methods for handling them. This includes the damage formula.

Inheritance

Interactions.DamageCalcStep damageStep

The DamageCalcStep to add.

The index to insert the damage step at. If less than 0, it will be added to the end of the list.
| Improve this Doc View Source

AttemptDamageEntities(BattleEntity, IList<BattleEntity>, DamageData, Interactions.VictimMissInteraction)

Have an attacker attempt to deal damage to a set of victims.

Based on the ContactType of this BattleAction, this can fail, resulting in an interruption. In the event of an interruption, no further entities are tested.

Declaration
public static InteractionResult[] AttemptDamageEntities(BattleEntity attacker, IList<BattleEntity> victims, DamageData damageInfo, Interactions.VictimMissInteraction onVictimMiss)
Parameters
Type Name Description
BattleEntity attacker

The BattleEntity dealing the damage.
System.Collections.Generic.IList<BattleEntity> victims

The BattleEntities to attempt to inflict damage on.
DamageData damageInfo

The damage information to use.
Interactions.VictimMissInteraction onVictimMiss

A delegate invoked when the attacker misses a victim.
Returns
Type Description
InteractionResult[]

An array of InteractionResults containing all the interactions. Some entries of the array will have null values if the attacker misses or is interrupted.

GetDamageInteraction(InteractionParamHolder)

Calculates and returns the entire damage interaction between two BattleEntities.

This returns all the necessary information for both BattleEntities, including the total amount of damage dealt, the type of Elemental damage to deal, the Status Effects to inflict, and whether the attack successfully hit or not.

Declaration
public static InteractionResult GetDamageInteraction(in InteractionParamHolder interactionParam)
Parameters
Type Name Description
InteractionParamHolder interactionParam

An InteractionParamHolder containing the BattleEntities interacting and data about their interaction.
Returns
Type Description
InteractionResult

An InteractionResult containing InteractionHolders for both the victim and the attacker.
